description: Dell is an essential technology company in the data era that aims to use technology at its forefront to drive innovation. I am part of the Data Platform Services (DPS) team under Dell Digital. Working with this team, I underpin various data engineers and scientists at Dell by orchestrating how the data moves and processes.
tasks: Contributed to the development of cloud-enabled data workspace with Spark on PKS. The workbench included multiple features, frameworks, libraries, and processes for efficient data movement and processing.
Responsible for user onboarding and code migration for 10+ teams. Developed a harmonized method to automate user-support queries, improving customer satistfaction.
Leveraged Spark as a data processing tool and framework for multiple ETL jobs reducing the time to process by 40%.
Working on an Anamoly detection project for the Global Supply Chain Management Team (GSCM) to identify anomalous logs.
Managing software documentation and testing processes. Charting out design and product specifications as instructed by clients and stakeholders.
